name: @amical/swift-helper
description: Swift native helper for accessibility APIs and system integration

scripts.build:native: mkdir -p .build && swift build --configuration release && mkdir -p bin && cp .build/release/SwiftHelper bin/SwiftHelper
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @amical/types generate:all && swift build --configuration debug && mkdir -p bin && cp .build/debug/SwiftHelper bin/SwiftHelper
